name: Human Dynamic
description: Human Dynamic’s professional team includes a well-rounded mix of people management consultants, HR professionals, psychologists, counselors, lawyers, accountants, work life coaches and wellness consultants. Our 13 direct offices spread over Hong Kong, Korea, China Mainland, Taiwan, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, and India, are staffed and run by locals who are familiar with the cultural needs yet sensitive to the global work environment. Our team is further augmented by an extensive professional affiliate network in more than 30 countries in Australia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, North America, and Latin America, which works closely with us to cater to the unique local community and diverse individual needs in each location. Human Dynamic now covers at least half a million lives globally.

enhanced_description: Human Dynamic (HD), established in 1993 and headquartered in Hong Kong, is a dominant force in Asia Pacific's Leadership and Change landscape. As a global HR consulting firm, HD offers a one-stop solution for businesses navigating the complexities of globalization and organizational change. Their comprehensive services focus on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. Human Dynamic's professional team includes a multidisciplinary mix of people management consultants, HR professionals, psychologists, counselors, lawyers, accountants, work life coaches, and wellness consultants. With 13 direct offices across Hong Kong, Korea, China Mainland, Taiwan, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, and India, staffed by local experts, and further augmented by an extensive professional affiliate network in over 30 countries spanning Australia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, North America, and Latin America, Human Dynamic covers at least half a million lives globally. They are dedicated to helping organizations foster the next generation of leaders, build stronger talent pipelines by closing critical skills gaps through continuous learning strategies, and transform organizations to achieve breakthrough value.
